isis.stitle: Spanish - Guía para Localización de Fallas del Sistema Eléctrico - 3200, 4200, 4300, 4400, 7300, 7400, 7500, 8500, 8600 - POWER STEERING GEAR: SHEPPARD MODEL 292, 392, 492 - SERIES 5 OUTPUT SHAFT SEAL SPECIAL PROCEDURE - INSTALL

svcproc.title: INSTALL
svcproc.para: Refer to Figure 7 for the following Items in parentheses.

step1.para: Lubricate the O.D. and I.D. of seal assembly (Item 7) with chassis lube or equivalent. Wrap the splined end of shaft with greased paper and slide the seal into place over the shaft. Carefully tap seal assembly into housing bore until it is flush with face of housing.

Install retainer plate (Item 3) and four hex head bolts (Item 4) as shown. Tighten bolts to 10 to 14 ft-lbs. (14 to 19 Nm). To facilitate future service, both the retainer plate and hex head bolts can be sprayed with undercoating. Care should be taken to avoid spraying the shaft and housing face on base mount applications.
Install pitman arm (Item 5) by aligning timing mark on pitman arm with timing mark on shaft.

Install pitman arm retainer (Item 6) by applying never seez or white lead between pitman arm and retainer, in the threads of the shaft, and on the threads of the retainer. Tighten pitman arm retainer to: 292-392: 225 ft-lbs. (305 Nm); 492: 450 ft-lbs. (610 Nm).
